text: The Secret of the Iron Door () is a 1970 Soviet movie directed by Mikhail Yuzovsky.Биография Михаила ЮзовскогоТАЙНА ЖЕЛЕЗНОЙ ДВЕРИ (1970) It stars Evaldas Mikaliunas, Andrei Kharybin, and Dmitri Yuzovsky. == Actors == * Evaldas Mikaliunas as Tolik (boy) * Andrei Kharybin as Mishka (boy) * Dmitri Yuzovsky as Mitka (boy) * Sergei Yevsyunin as Wizard (boy) * Alisa Freindlich as Tolik's mother * Oleg Tabakov as Tolik's father == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1970 adventure movies Category:1970s science fiction movies Category:Russian adventure movies Category:Russian science fiction movies Category:Movies directed by Mikhail Yuzovsky
title: The Secret of the Iron Door
